rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment uses neutral language describing action ('working on the development').
The segment reports on working on test development.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports action being taken without explicit calming language.
No minimiser or scale contrast found.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Describes an ongoing development effort ('working on the development of a rapid test') which is a development capability/preparedness measure, without active reassurance.
